mapper.insert: insert into recipe(member_id, type, situation, ingredient, method, time, level, serving, recipe_img, recipe_name, recipe_order, recipe_ingredient) values(#{member_id},#{type},#{situation},#{ingredient}, #{method},#{time},#{level},#{serving},#{recipe_img}, #{recipe_name},#{recipe_order},#{recipe_ingredient});
mapper.select: select * from recipe order by recipe_id desc
